name: Ogdoadic Daybreak
text: Tribute 1 Reptile monster; for every 2 Levels that Tributed monster had on the field, Special Summon up to 1 "Ogdoadic Token" (Reptile/DARK/Level 2/ATK 0/DEF 0). During your Main Phase: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 of your banished Reptile monsters; shuffle it into the Deck, then you can send 1 Reptile monster from your Deck to the GY. You can only use each effect of "Ogdoadic Daybreak" once per turn.
